name: @wrstudios/image-proxy-client
description: image proxy utilities for client apps
author: Lone Wolf Technologies

scripts.bump:
echo "Please use one of the following commands:
  bump:major - New version includes breaking changes
  bump:minor - New version could potentially include breaking changes
  bump:patch - New version definitely does not include breaking changes
" && exit 1
scripts.bump:major: yarn build && yarn version --major --no-git-tag-version && yarn bump-readme && yarn commit-new-version && yarn tag-new-version && yarn push-new-version
scripts.bump:minor: yarn build && yarn version --minor --no-git-tag-version && yarn bump-readme && yarn commit-new-version && yarn tag-new-version && yarn push-new-version
scripts.bump:patch: yarn build && yarn version --patch --no-git-tag-version && yarn bump-readme && yarn commit-new-version && yarn tag-new-version && yarn push-new-version
